title: Ep. 554 A Redline Has Been Crossed !
description:
In this episode -   The NFL protests just crossed a redline. https://legalinsurrection.com/2017/09/nfl-sunday-gone-wild-numerous-teams-join-protests-against-national-anthem/?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+LegalInsurrection+%28Le%C2%B7gal+In%C2%B7sur%C2%B7rec%C2%B7tion%29   And fans are paying attention.  http://www.breitbart.com/sports/2017/09/22/not-just-tv-nfl-suffering-tumbling-turnout-stadiums/?utm_source=facebook&utm_medium=social   The anti-American sickness is spreading. http://m.sfgate.com/athletics/article/A-s-Bruce-Maxwell-first-MLB-player-to-kneel-for-12223798.php   The NFL players are protesting in support of a policy that would hurt the minority community.  https://www.wsj.com/articles/marylands-bail-reform-is-a-warning-for-would-be-moralizers-1506119393   Why Obama really spied on Trump. http://www.frontpagemag.com/fpm/267923/why-obama-really-spied-trump-daniel-greenfield   Obamacare hurts the poor through this massive tax. https://www.wsj.com/articles/obamacares-tax-on-the-poor-1506118414   The growing danger of a drone swarm attack at the White House.  http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/article/2635455
